titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 2882.
Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 2882.

action.text: Mr. Diaz-Balart asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution corrects the title of H.R. 2882 (as enrolled) to read Making further consolidated appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2024, and for other purposes.
